title: similar font to rotis semi serif?
content: Does somebody knows a font which is similar to the rotis semi serif?“The Semi Serif has just a few serifs, and the Serif has serifs and strokes with mostly vertical axes.“ Thank’s
author: blingbling

comments.content:
Hi Katja,

have a look at [Areplos](http://web.archive.org/web/20130707145559/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-56-areplos) by [Jan Solpera](http://web.archive.org/web/20130707145559/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jan%20Solpera).  
F
wonderful, thank you for your help.
